title: Medallion, 3rd–4th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, Z-spun wool. 
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: Four crosses surrounded by circles interlaced by diagonal lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 3rd–4th century.
3rd–4th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, Z-spun wool.
